ApproxsimClient.evolver
Interface EvolverEventListener

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultEvolverEventListener
public interface EvolverEventListener
extends EventListener

Specifies the methods called on objects listening to EvolverEvents

Method Summary
 void information(EvolverEvent event, String information)
          Called when the evolver has something noteworthy to report.
 void newEvaluation(EvolverEvent event, Evaluation newEvaluation)
          Called when the evolver adds a new evaluation.
 void newEvaluator(EvolverEvent event, Evaluator newEvaluator)
          Called when the evolver starts a new Evaluator.
 void runningStateChanged(EvolverEvent event)
          Called when the evolver starts, stops, continues, pauses or aborts the evolving.
